languages.text: "Я много думал о духе закона Его, о том, чего бы сам Император хотел для нас. Если бы мне раньше кто-то сказал, что я буду о таком помышлять, я бы, может, и лицо ему разбил. Но теперь я не вижу в подобных мыслях ереси. Наоборот, они словно приближают меня к Императору".

"I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."
languages.original_text: "Я много думал о духе закона Его, о том, чего бы сам Император хотел для нас. Если бы мне раньше кто-то сказал, что я буду о таком помышлять, я бы, может, и лицо ему разбил. Но теперь я не вижу в подобных мыслях ереси. Наоборот, они словно приближают меня к Императору".

If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

languages.text: 「最近は、皇帝陛下の法の精神や、陛下ご自身が私たちに望んでおられることについて考えるようになりました。そんなことを考えるようになるなんて誰かに言われたら、以前の私なら、そいつの顔を叩き潰してたでしょうね。ですが本当のところ、今ではそういう思考を異端だとは思っていません。いえ、むしろその逆です。そう考えることで、皇帝陛下に一歩近づける気がするんです」
languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: 「最近は、皇帝陛下の法の精神や、陛下ご自身が私たちに望んでおられることについて考えるようになりました。そんなことを考えるようになるなんて誰かに言われたら、以前の私なら、そいつの顔を叩き潰してたでしょうね。ですが本当のところ、今ではそういう思考を異端だとは思っていません。いえ、むしろその逆です。そう考えることで、皇帝陛下に一歩近づける気がするんです」

languages.text: "Ich habe über den Geist Seines Gesetzes nachgedacht, und darüber, was der Imperator selbst für uns will. Hätte mir früher jemand gesagt, dass ich einmal über solche Dinge grübeln würde, hätte ich ihm wahrscheinlich den Kopf eingeschlagen. Aber die Wahrheit ist, ich kann in solchen Gedanken keine Ketzerei mehr erkennen. Im Gegenteil. Ich habe das Gefühl, dass sie mich dem Imperator näher bringen."
languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe über den Geist Seines Gesetzes nachgedacht, und darüber, was der Imperator selbst für uns will. Hätte mir früher jemand gesagt, dass ich einmal über solche Dinge grübeln würde, hätte ich ihm wahrscheinlich den Kopf eingeschlagen. Aber die Wahrheit ist, ich kann in solchen Gedanken keine Ketzerei mehr erkennen. Im Gegenteil. Ich habe das Gefühl, dass sie mich dem Imperator näher bringen."

languages.text: « J'ai réfléchi à l'esprit de Sa loi et ce que l'Empereur Lui-même souhaite pour nous. Il y a encore peu de temps, si quiconque m'avait dit une telle chose, je l'aurais probablement massacré. Mais en vérité, je ne perçois plus d'hérésie dans ces pensées. Non, au contraire : j'ai l'impression qu'elles me rapprochent de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

Il y a encore peu de temps, si quiconque m'avait dit une telle chose, je l'aurais probablement massacré. Mais en vérité, je ne perçois plus d'hérésie dans ces pensées. Non, au contraire : j'ai l'impression qu'elles me rapprochent de l'Empereur. »

« J'ai réfléchi à l'esprit de Sa loi et ce que l'Empereur Lui-même souhaite pour nous. Il y a encore peu de temps, si quiconque m'avait dit une telle chose, je l'aurais probablement massacré. Mais en vérité, je ne perçois plus d'hérésie dans ces pensées. Non, au contraire : j'ai l'impression qu'elles me rapprochent de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: «He reflexionado sobre el espíritu de Sus leyes y lo que el propio Emperador desea para nosotros. Si alguien me hubiese dicho antes que pensaría de este modo, probablemente le habría saltado todos los dientes. Pero lo cierto es que ya no considero heréticas tales ideas. No, más bien al contrario: creo que me acercan aún más al Emperador».
languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: «He reflexionado sobre el espíritu de Sus leyes y lo que el propio Emperador desea para nosotros. Si alguien me hubiese dicho antes que pensaría de este modo, probablemente le habría saltado todos los dientes. Pero lo cierto es que ya no considero heréticas tales ideas. No, más bien al contrario: creo que me acercan aún más al Emperador».

languages.text: “这段时间，我一直在反思帝皇律法真正的核心，以及帝皇对我们的要求。换做以前，如果有人告诉我，说我以后会考虑这样的事情，我恐怕会一拳砸在那个人脸上。但老实说，如今我不再认为这些想法是异端邪说。不，恰恰相反，我认为这些思考让我离祂更近了。”
languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: “这段时间，我一直在反思帝皇律法真正的核心，以及帝皇对我们的要求。换做以前，如果有人告诉我，说我以后会考虑这样的事情，我恐怕会一拳砸在那个人脸上。但老实说，如今我不再认为这些想法是异端邪说。不，恰恰相反，我认为这些思考让我离祂更近了。”

languages.text: "İmparator'un Yasası'nın ruhu ve bizzat O'nun bizim için istediklerini düşünüyordum. Vaktinde biri bana gelip böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yoracağımı söyleseydi muhtemelen suratını dağıtırdım. Gerçek şu ki artık bu tür fikirlerde kâfirlik görmüyorum. Aksine beni İmparator'a daha çok yaklaştırdıklarını hissediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un Yasası'nın ruhu ve bizzat O'nun bizim için istediklerini düşünüyordum. Vaktinde biri bana gelip böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yoracağımı söyleseydi muhtemelen suratını dağıtırdım. Gerçek şu ki artık bu tür fikirlerde kâfirlik görmüyorum. Aksine beni İmparator'a daha çok yaklaştırdıklarını hissediyorum."

"İmparator'un kanunlarının ruhu ve bizzat Kendisinin bizim için istedikleri üzerine düşünüyordum. Vaktinde biri bana gelip böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yoracağımı söyleseydi muhtemelen suratını dağıtırdım. Ancak gerçek şu ki artık bu tür fikirlerde kâfirlik görmüyorum. Tam tersine, beni İmparator'a daha çok yaklaştırdıklarını hissediyorum."

languages.original_text: "I've been reflecting on the spirit of His Law and what the Emperor Himself wants for us. If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts. No, it's the opposite: I feel like they bring me closer to the Emperor."
